org.springframework.http.codec

类 BodyInserters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.codec.BodyInserters

  • public abstract class BodyInserters
extends Object
    Implementations of BodyInserter that write various bodies, such a reactive streams, server-sent events, resources, etc.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Arjen Poutsma

    • 构造器概要

        public BodyInserters()

    • 方法详细资料

      • fromObject

        public static <T> BodyInserter<T,ReactiveHttpOutputMessage> fromObject(T body)
        Return a BodyInserter that writes the given single object.
        参数:
        body - the body of the response
        返回:
        a BodyInserter that writes a single object

      • fromPublisher

        public static <S extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>,T> BodyInserter<S,ReactiveHttpOutputMessage> fromPublisher(S publisher,
                                                                                                                     Class<T> elementClass)
        Return a BodyInserter that writes the given Publisher.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the elements contained in the publisher
        S - the type of the Publisher
        参数:
        publisher - the publisher to stream to the response body
        elementClass - the class of elements contained in the publisher
        返回:
        a BodyInserter that writes a Publisher

      • fromPublisher

        public static <S extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>,T> BodyInserter<S,ReactiveHttpOutputMessage> fromPublisher(S publisher,
                                                                                                                     org.springframework.core.ResolvableType elementType)
        Return a BodyInserter that writes the given Publisher.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the elements contained in the publisher
        S - the type of the Publisher
        参数:
        publisher - the publisher to stream to the response body
        elementType - the type of elements contained in the publisher
        返回:
        a BodyInserter that writes a Publisher

      • fromResource

        public static <T extends org.springframework.core.io.Resource> BodyInserter<T,ReactiveHttpOutputMessage> fromResource(T resource)
        Return a BodyInserter that writes the given Resource. If the resource can be resolved to a file, it will be copied using zero-copy
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the Resource
        参数:
        resource - the resource to write to the response
        返回:
        a BodyInserter that writes a Publisher

      • fromServerSentEvents

        public static <T,S extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<ServerSentEvent<T>>> BodyInserter<S,ServerHttpResponse> fromServerSentEvents(S eventsPublisher)
        Return a BodyInserter that writes the given ServerSentEvent publisher.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the elements contained in the ServerSentEvent
        参数:
        eventsPublisher - the ServerSentEvent publisher to write to the response body
        返回:
        a BodyInserter that writes a ServerSentEvent publisher
        另请参阅:
        Server-Sent Events W3C recommendation

      • fromServerSentEvents

        public static <T,S extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>> BodyInserter<S,ServerHttpResponse> fromServerSentEvents(S eventsPublisher,
                                                                                                                     Class<T> eventClass)
        Return a BodyInserter that writes the given Publisher publisher as Server-Sent Events.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the elements contained in the publisher
        参数:
        eventsPublisher - the publisher to write to the response body as Server-Sent Events
        eventClass - the class of event contained in the publisher
        返回:
        a BodyInserter that writes the given Publisher publisher as Server-Sent Events
        另请参阅:
        Server-Sent Events W3C recommendation

      • fromServerSentEvents

        public static <T,S extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>> BodyInserter<S,ServerHttpResponse> fromServerSentEvents(S eventsPublisher,
                                                                                                                     org.springframework.core.ResolvableType eventType)
        Return a BodyInserter that writes the given Publisher publisher as Server-Sent Events.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the elements contained in the publisher
        参数:
        eventsPublisher - the publisher to write to the response body as Server-Sent Events
        eventType - the type of event contained in the publisher
        返回:
        a BodyInserter that writes the given Publisher publisher as Server-Sent Events
        另请参阅:
        Server-Sent Events W3C recommendation
